statements: DELETE FROM wrestler_profiles WHERE name = 'John Cena';
DELETE FROM wrestler_profiles WHERE championships LIKE '%WWE%';
DELETE FROM wrestler_profiles WHERE name = 'John Cena' AND age = 43;
DELETE FROM championships WHERE year < 2018 AND winner_id = (SELECT id FROM wrestler_profiles WHERE age > 30);
DELETE FROM promotions WHERE name = 'WWE' AND location = 'US';
DELETE FROM wrestler_profiles WHERE age < 25 AND weight > 200;
DELETE FROM championships_history WHERE wrestler_id = 1 AND title_id = 2;
DELETE FROM championship_titles WHERE title_name = 'Heavyweight Championship';
DELETE FROM wrestler_profiles WHERE name = 'John Cena';
